short_summary: Shared Services Canada requires the expertise of multiple resources in various categories, including Business System Analyst, Platform Analyst, and Technology Architect, to support the integration of solutions under the TBIPS framework. This procurement is set aside for Aboriginal Business.
description: The Canadian government's Shared Services Canada (SSC) is seeking to acquire the services of multiple resources in various categories, including Business System Analyst, Platform Analyst, and Technology Architect, to support the integration of solutions under the Task-Based and Informatics Professional Services (TBIPS) framework. SSC intends to award one three-year contract, with two one-year options. The duration of this requirement will be approximately 220 days per year. For security reasons, all members of the supplier team must have a valid Facility Security Clearance at the Top Secret level.
